description: The function 'create_multi_inequality_number_line' generates a 2x2 grid of inequality number lines. These visualizations are used in teaching mathematical concepts related to inequalities, providing a visual representation of the inequality on a number line. Each subplot is labeled with a title (A, B, C, D) for easy reference.

stimulus_type_specification.title: Available Images: Multi Inequality Number Lines
stimulus_type_specification.description: The function 'create_multi_inequality_number_line' generates a 2x2 grid of inequality number lines. It accepts a 'MultiInequalityNumberLine' object as input, which contains exactly 4 'InequalityNumberLine' objects. Each 'InequalityNumberLine' object represents a single inequality on a number line, including the range of the number line and the inequality to be displayed. The function validates the input to ensure that there are exactly 4 'InequalityNumberLine' objects. This visualization is useful in teaching and learning of algebraic inequalities, allowing students to visualize the solutions of inequalities on a number line.

details: The function accepts a 'MultiInequalityNumberLine' object as input.
The 'MultiInequalityNumberLine' object contains a list of 'InequalityNumberLine' objects.
Each 'InequalityNumberLine' object represents a single inequality on a number line, including the range of the number line and the inequality to be displayed.
The 'MultiInequalityNumberLine' object must contain exactly 4 'InequalityNumberLine' objects.
Each 'InequalityNumberLine' object must have a valid range and inequality.
The function generates a 2x2 grid of inequality number lines.
Each subplot is labeled with a title (A, B, C, D) for easy reference.
The range of each number line and the inequality displayed are determined by the corresponding 'InequalityNumberLine' object.

educational_standards.description: Graph the solution sets of inequalities on a number line and interpret the graphed solution in the context of the problem.
